name: The Strangers Gift
description:
An interactive twine game

One night your door bell is ringing, you don't expect anyone at this hour and when you open the door you see just a gift box in front of your door and you don’t know who put it. You take it and open it. What you saw shocked you! It's a decayed skull. You are trying to learn then the sender and/or escape from the "gifts". In the meantime you deal with many bad things. At the end of the story, some unknown, facts and secret things come to light.
